comment: This professor never seems to know what she is doing and is always unorganized. And she grades insanely hard. Every week's lab worksheet I completed, I never got above a low B. Another thing is taking the prelab quizzes, good luck because none of the information is on the protocol.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: Very disorganized professor, doesn't even know what is going on. Never listens to students when needed help. A family emergency can occur and you may not be able to turn in an assignment so you email her and her response would be " Sorry, Please let me know ahead of time." As if we knew stuff were to happen. No considerate to students.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Tough grader
